
## Installing `atlastools`

This paper refers extensively to the `R` package `atlastools` (Gupte 2020), which can be installed from an online repository.

```{r install_package, eval=FALSE}
# use either devtools or remotes to install
install.packages("devtools")

# installation using devtools
devtools::install_github("pratikunterwegs/atlastools")
```
